thread.title: Auburn man shot to death by police officer after 'suspicious incident' in Opelika
thread.title_full: Auburn man shot to death by police officer after 'suspicious incident' in Opelika

author: Riley Conlon
title: Auburn man shot to death by police officer after 'suspicious incident' in Opelika
text: Auburn man shot to death by police officer after 'suspicious incident' in Opelika Advertisement Auburn man shot to death by police officer after 'suspicious incident' in Opelika The Alabama Law Enforcement Agency is investigating after an Opelika police officer shot and killed a man last weekend.Just after 3 a.m. Sunday, an officer responded to a call regarding a "suspicious incident" in the 1800 Block of Century Boulevard, according to ALEA.Once on scene, the officer encountered 26-year-old Tice Daequan Cobb of Auburn, who was reportedly armed.>> FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL: Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube An altercation occurred between the two and Cobb was subsequently shot by the officer and pronounced dead at the scene.Further details are unavailable at this time as ALEA continues its investigation.Stay updated on the latest stories with the WVTM 13 app. You can download it here. OPELIKA, Ala. â€” >> FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL: Stay updated on the latest stories with the WVTM 13 app. You can download it The Alabama Law Enforcement Agency is investigating after an Opelika police officer shot and killed a man last weekend. Just after 3 a.m. Sunday, an officer responded to a call regarding a "suspicious incident" in the 1800 Block of Century Boulevard, according to ALEA. Advertisement Once on scene, the officer encountered 26-year-old Tice Daequan Cobb of Auburn, who was reportedly armed. >> FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL: [Instagram ](https://www.instagram.com/wvtm13/)| [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@WVTM13) An altercation occurred between the two and Cobb was subsequently shot by the officer and pronounced dead at the scene. Further details are unavailable at this time as ALEA continues its investigation. Stay updated on the latest stories with the WVTM 13 app. You can download it [here](https://www.wvtm13.com/article/get-wvtm-13-on-the-go-download/44045536).
